# (APPENDIX) Appendices {-}

# Data Sets {#data-sets}

```{r, echo=FALSE}
f <- dir('data', pattern = 'csv$', full.names = T)

l <- lapply(f, function(x) {
  l <- readLines(x) |>
    grep('^#', x = _, value = T) |>
    sub('^# ', '', x = _) |>
    sub('  ', '* ', x = _)

  v <- grep('^Variables:$', l)
  l <- append(l, paste('File:', sub('data/', '', x)), v - 1)
  l <- append(l, '', v )
  l <- append(l, '', v + 2)

  l[1] <- paste('##', l[1], '{-}')
  l <- c('', l)

  l
}) |>
  unlist() |> 
  paste(collapse = '\n')

```

```{r, results='asis', echo=FALSE}
cat(l)
```
